com.googlecode.gwtmvc.client
Class MvcEvent<V>

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.gwtmvc.client.Event
      com.googlecode.gwtmvc.client.MvcEvent<V>
Type Parameters:
V - value
public class MvcEvent<V>
extends Event

Represents an event on the gui. Lexical note: It is different from the gwt 1.6 handler/event system, But a gwt-mvc Event will generally be created by a listener/handler of user gestures. USAGE: create an event to notify a user gesture to the controller.

          Builds an simple event

          Builds an event with a value
MvcEvent(java.lang.Enum action, V value, Maskable maskable)
          Builds an event with a value, and a maskable
